basics.name: Daniel Suhr
basics.label: Passionate software engineer with focus on delivering value
basics.summary: Experience software engineer with a bias for action for delivering measureable value to internal and external customers.

work.name: Ford Motor Company
work.summary: Leading software development of internal tools development for vehicle performance & latency analysis
highlights: Architected FastAPI Python backend with Next.js frontend application for platform, feature and system engineers to visualize changes to vehicle performance and latency
Enabled automated deployment of GCP CloudRun services with Entra ID authentication using GCP CloudBuild

work.name: Ford Motor Company
highlights: Managed small team of software engineers that collaborated with other development teams on various automation workflows
Architected CI/CD workflows for critical vehicle deliverables using GitHub Actions
Facilitated software development training courses in Python (Clean Code, SOLID Principles)
Deployed and managed infrastructure in GCP using Terraform

work.name: Ford Motor Company
highlights: Designed & implemented automation workflows for a instruction-level simulation tool
Managed bare-metal high-performance compute infrastucture for execution of vehicle simulations using Ansible
Learned to navigate the labyrinth of legacy IT processes & systems
